description: [Silence](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0091) has used HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run, HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run, and the Startup folder to establish persistence.(Citation: Group IB Silence Sept 2018)

external_references.description: Group-IB. (2018, September). Silence: Moving Into the Darkside. Retrieved May 5, 2020.
